> On Mon, Jan 12, 2037 at 05:52:40PM -0600, Barry Clark wrote:
> > hey guys, I'm new to Tinkering. I just make fireworks and sell them at
the
> > Tunnell in EC to make me some $$. I was looking for a nice site that has
> > tinkering recipies. I found one that has flameless lanerns. Where can I
find
> > the twine? whats it cost? is it silk or metal? Whats the lanern sell for?
>
> Check this site: http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering/
>
> And flameless lanterns don't sell. Use them to get your skill up, but
> that's about all they're good for.
>
> Pasketti of Povar
